story:
Once upon a time, in a faraway land of mystical forests and towering mountains, there lived a young bear named Dmitri. Dmitri was a curious and brave bear who loved exploring the world around him.

One day, as Dmitri was wandering through the forest, he stumbled upon a hidden meadow filled with colorful flowers and sparkling streams. In the center of the meadow, there was a small, glowing lantern. Intrigued, Dmitri approached the lantern and found a tiny fairy named Anya.

Anya explained that she was the guardian of the meadow and the keeper of the lantern, which held a magical light that could grant wishes. She told Dmitri that the lantern could only be used once, and whoever made a wish would have it granted, but with a price to pay.

Dmitri thought for a moment and decided that he would make a wish to bring peace and happiness to all the creatures in the forest. As he made his wish, the lantern glowed brighter than ever, filling the meadow with a warm, comforting light.

Suddenly, Dmitri felt a wave of contentment wash over him, and he knew that his wish had come true. The animals of the forest began to gather around the meadow, and a sense of joy and harmony enveloped the land.

From that day on, Dmitri became known as the bear who had brought peace to the forest. And every night, as the sun set and the moon rose high in the sky, the creatures of the forest would gather around the glowing lantern in the meadow, listening to the gentle whispers of the wind and feeling the magic of Dmitri's wish.

And so, dear child, remember that even the smallest of creatures can make a difference in the world. With a kind heart and a brave spirit, you can bring light and happiness to those around you. Sleep tight, and dream of the magical adventures that await you in the land of dreams. Goodnight.
